title: RS21643
content: On January 7, 2003, the House created a Select Committee on Homeland Security withlegislative and oversight jurisdiction over the newly created Department of Homeland Security. The selectcommittee is alsomandated to study House rules, including Rule X, as they apply to homeland security matters, and to recommendchanges to theHouse Rules Committee no later than September 30, 2004. This report briefly addresses jurisdiction and referralreform options. Itwill be updated if events warrant.
